content: stitches the two extra stitches will be at the beginning and end of each row repeat like this example using row 1 k1 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 p4 c4b p4 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 twice k1 after 2 repeats of the cable chart repeat row 1-11 and then do the 3 following rounds as written remember you are still adding that extra k1 on either side of the bracketed stitches but repeat the final round 7-10 times for a longer ribbing section to accommodate the extra length of the older kindles for the ipad cast on 76 stitches follow directions as for kindle however at the beginning and end of each row repeat replace k2 with k5 example using row 1 k5 p2 1/1lc p2 k2 p4 c4b p4 k2 p2 1/1lc p2 k5 twice repeat cable chart 3 times then proceed as follows next row k5 p2 k2 p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 k2 p2 k5 twice repeat for 4 more row or until desired length bind off and enjoy another option for doing the 1/1lc bring right needle behind first st on left needle and k into back loop of second st on left needle k first st on left needle drop both sts from left needle for questions and comments please contact jeffrey schindler jeffrey_schindler@yahoo com visit my blog at jeffiknitter wordpress com or on ravelry as jeffiknitter thank you 2 3
